website_summaries.verdict: This eye cream can be used day and night to counter common issues around the eyes.
pros: Helps de-puff under the eyes and smooth the appearance of fine lines
Black tea complex firms skin and fights free radicals
Also improves the look of dark circles
A little goes a long way
cons: One of Fresh's pricier skincare products

customer_reviews.title: Great product for puffy eyes
customer_reviews.text: So happy to find this sold by makeup mall. Been using it for months, but originallybought it from Sephora store and was put off by the stalking/hard-sell approach there. Can recommend it highly. Seller sent product quickly and is exactly what I have been using. Puffiness on my old eyes has disappeared with daily use of a minuscule amount. Will always look for it from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: pdbee

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is the product I always buy from Sephora. Bought it here on Amazon because it was cheaper. Big mistake, package damaged, possibly opened already , seemed " old " , color and texture seemed different. Large air bubble in cream . Seemed like it either wasn't full or partially dried up. Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Shelljeff

customer_reviews.title: Product is not living up to my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The product like so many others offers great results. I have been using it now for just over a month and have seen very little change in what it's advertised to accomplish. I've tried other products, that cost less, that have given similar results. I'll finish off the jar I purchased and see if there is any change after a more prolonged time of usage. If there is a visible change in that time frame I'll write a more favorable review. Dr. B Roach
customer_reviews.author: Freedom

customer_reviews.title: Really works to moisturize the under eye area
customer_reviews.text: Great product and buy for the money. I've been using this brand for a while now and it is my go-to for under eye cream.
customer_reviews.author: T. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worth it !
customer_reviews.text: I liked a lot it’s been 2 weeks already using this product around my eyes and I can feel it works. It’s smooth, and once this “cold” cream touch my skin feels so great and resting during the night. Prior comments convinced me to get this product because it’s worth it !
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Does not work considering it is such a pricey product
customer_reviews.text: Dark circles showed no noticeable change after 3 weeks of consistent use. Expensive product and completely ineffective.
customer_reviews.author: Reva

customer_reviews.title: Jar was half full.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box the jar appeared to have been opened. When I took off the lid the jar was half full. This is expensive and to receive a half jar is really bad. Will not buy skin products from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Unsatisfied customer.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product -- not too light
customer_reviews.text: Some eye creams are too light and don't seem to do anything. This is a great product -- not too light, but also not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: V Donovan

customer_reviews.title: great eye cream
customer_reviews.text: i swear it’s keeps my puffiness down ! love this product
customer_reviews.author: Paula Bellin

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cream!
customer_reviews.text: I can feel it's coolness calming my under eye puffyness right away. It has lightened that area too so I feel & look more refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: nancy dorsey

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: It is a good under eye moisturizer. I still have circles But they would probably be worse without it.
customer_reviews.author: GDV

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's pricey, but it lasts a long time (about 6 months for me). I'm 35 and was starting to see some fine lines and wrinkles. About a month after starting to use it, friends actually complimented that I looked younger. It's good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: NickDIY

product_meta.title: Fresh Black Tea Age-Delay Eye Concentrate 15ml/0.5oz
product_meta.description: Size:SmallAn advanced anti-aging eye concentrateHelps improve the appearance of eye area skin & revive tired eyesContains a proprietary complex derived from black tea blackberry leaf extract & lychee seed extractHelps combat damaging free radicals & improve skin elasticityBlended with antioxidant-rich noni fruit juice to retain & boost moisture Reduces the appearance of dark circles & puffinessUnveils a firmer smoother more vibrant & younger looking eye area
